Registration Guide ------------------ ### For New Undergraduate Student #### Semester II, 2024/2025 Session (February 2025 Intake) [Undergraduate](https://admission.utm.my/new2024/undergraduate-kit/?et_fb=1&PageSpeed=off) [Postgraduate](https://admission.utm.my/postgraduate-kit/) [Open Distance Learning (odl)](https://admission.utm.my/new2024/eregistrationodl/) ![](https://admission.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/461/2025/02/Registration-Guide-for-Feb-2025-intake-13.2.2025.png "Registration Guide for Feb 2025 intake (13.2.2025)") #### eRegistration KIT #### International Undergraduate ### Documents Required Please note that ALL documents MUST be uploaded in ORIGINAL copy. * Original scan of EMGS Approval Letter/EVAL (For student currently in Malaysia) / Related Pass * Original scan of Academic Qualifications * Original scan of English Proficiency Certificate * Proof of Tuition Fees Payment / Sponsorship Letter * Form 1 – Letter of Undertaking * Form 2 – New Student Registration Form * Form 3 – English Preparatory Form * Form 4 – Original scan of Health Assessment Form (Verified by Medical Officer) * Form 5 – Personal Data Protection Notice ### Download form here [Form 1 - Letter of Undertaking](https://admission.utm.my/new2024/wp-content/uploads/sites/476/2021/09/Letter-of-Undertaking-2021.pdf) [Form 2 - New Student Registration Form](https://admission.utm.my/new2024/wp-content/uploads/sites/476/2020/09/Form-2-Student-Registration-Form.pdf) [Form 3 - English Preparatory Form (if applicable)](https://admission.utm.my/new2024/wp-content/uploads/sites/476/2022/12/Form-3-Preparatory-English-Programme-Application-Form-For-applicants-who-do-not-meet-the-English-proficiency-requirements.pdf) [Form 4 - Original scan of Health Assessment Form (Verified by Medical Officer)](https://admission.utm.my/new2024/wp-content/uploads/sites/476/2020/09/Health-Assesment-Form-1.pdf) [Form 5 - Personal Data Protection Notice](https://admission.utm.my/new2024/wp-content/uploads/sites/476/2023/02/PERSONAL-DATA-PROTECTION-NOTICE.pdf) ### Register Online here For International Students, systems will be open from 2 September – 12 September 2024 [eDaftar System](https://edaftar.utm.my/login) For Malaysian Students, please complete the E-daftar from 7 September – 20 September 2024 [Click here](http://jpt.utm.my/) ### Student Orientation Week _(Minggu Mesra Mahasiswa)_ -------------------------- LIVE Facebook (FB) : UTM Student Affairs : [https://www.facebook.com/heputm](https://www.facebook.com/heputm) Please refer to UTM Student Affairs FB for more details of MMM slots ### International Student Orientation Programme (ISOP) [Click here](https://www.facebook.com/UTMInternational) ### **Beginning of Lecture Semester I, 2024/2025 Session**  UTM JB & KL  : 17 March – 4 April 2025 (Online Classes) UTM JB & KL : 7 April 2025 onwards (Physical Classes) **Please refer to UTM ACADEMIC CALENDAR 2024/2025 SESSION – [https://amd.utm.my/academic-calendar/](https://amd.utm.my/academic-calendar/) ** ### Briefing and Registration Course by Faculty Please refer to your faculty as below. #### Bridging Programme _School of Professional and Continuing Education (SPACE)_ | | | | --- | --- | | ##### **10 March 2025 (Monday)** | ##### **Activities** | | **10.00 am** | **Course Registration Briefing**
